thread.title: Thunder fans troll Kevin Durant with so many cupcakes
thread.title_full: Thunder fans troll Kevin Durant with so many cupcakes

author: USA TODAY
title: Thunder fans troll Kevin Durant with so many cupcakes
text:
Thunder fans troll Kevin Durant with so many cupcakes All of the cupcakes, including one young girl in a full costume. Post to Facebook Thunder fans troll Kevin Durant with so many cupcakes All of the cupcakes, including one young girl in a full costume.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/kevin-durant-thunder-cupcake-troll-oklahoma-city-fans-costume-westbrook-warriors-return/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Thunder fans troll Kevin Durant with so many cupcakes Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY Published 8:55   | Updated 2 minutes ago 
A young Thunder fan wears a cupcake costume before an NBA basketball game between the Golden State Warriors and the Oklahoma City Thunder in Oklahoma City, Saturday, Feb. 11, 2017. (Photo: AP) 
Kevin Durant is back in Oklahoma City for the first time since he joined the Warriors, and the Thunder fans are welcoming him with boos, anti-KD shirts , and lots and lots of cupcakes. 
The cupcake trolling is a result of this detail that was revealed in Sports Illustrated 's Lee Jenkins' feature story about Westbrook: 
Westbrook didn't disparage Durant. He didn't judge him. All he did was take a picture. When Kendrick Perkins played center for the Thunder, he called teammates "cupcake" if he thought they were acting a little soft. Westbrook and Durant adopted the term in jest. Westbrook posted a bittersweet pic on Instagram: three plates of cupcakes topped by red and blue stars and sprinkles. 
One young fan even dressed up like an actual cupcake - this costume is crazy, pretty cute, a little creepy. Well, this is happening. pic.twitter.com/WYtEeCGULz — Tim Bontemps (@TimBontemps) February 12, 2017 There is a little girl in a cupcake costume pic.twitter.com/I9sVhNMRVN — Anthony Slater (@anthonyVslater) February 12, 2017 A fan dressed as a cupcake to troll former Thunder star Kevin Durant. https://t.co/wGpKEkvNuK pic.twitter.com/r941UdiZNb — Marc J. Spears (@MarcJSpearsESPN) February 12, 2017 
There's also a man with a cupcake painted on his stomach that has KD's logo on the wrapper. NOT THE SAME CUPCAKE. NOT THE SAME CUPCAKE pic.twitter.com/TPex4pw117 — Def Pen Hoops (@DefPenHoops) February 12, 2017 
There are lots of cupcake shirts. — Nate Feken (@TheGreat_Nate) February 12, 2017 And now there are cupcake shirts pic.twitter.com/EpH82RuPsN — Fred Katz (@FredKatz) February 12, 2017 
Cupcake signs. — Steve Noah (@Steve_OS) February 12, 2017 *Insert cupcake emoji pic.twitter.com/BF8OZO9c0c — Def Pen Hoops (@DefPenHoops) February 12, 2017 Probably going to see a lot of signs with this theme tonight: pic.twitter.com/Hd6iEKygtP — Royce Young (@royceyoung) February 11, 2017 
All of the cupcakes. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/kevin-durant-thunder-cupcake-troll-oklahoma-city-fans-costume-westbrook-warriors-return/ Most Popular
